content: The list of places are: ['Closet', "Chief's office", 'Outside (dead end to east)', 'Outside (restaurant to north, mayer home to east)', "Mayor's house (scene of crime)", 'Living room', 'Dining room', "Upstairs Hallway (Mayer's House)", "Hallway (Mayer's House, east end, room to north)", 'Hallway (Mayer\'s House, "Guests" door to east)', "Hallway (Mayer's House, room to west, room to east)", "Hallway (Mayer's House, east/west intersect, exit to north)", 'Bedroom', 'Outside (video store to east)', 'Video Store', 'Outside (crossroads)', 'McDonalds', 'Outside (north end, east only available)', 'Music Store', 'Back of Music Store', 'Alley', 'Police Station', 'Outside (Holiday Inn to north, Doughnut King to east, the Wall to west)', 'Doughnut King', 'The Wall', 'Holiday Inn', 'Holiday Inn 15th Floor', 'Hallway (15th Floor, Room 1-7)', 'Hallway (15th Floor, east/west intersection)', 'Hallway (15th Floor, Room 19-22)', 'Hallway (sauna to west, Pool A to east)', 'Room # 30']
